statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE device_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Check-up';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedules GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, installation_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location LIKE 'Room%';

SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS maintenance_count FROM IoTDevices LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON IoTDevices.device_id = MaintenanceSchedule.device_id GROUP BY device_id, device_name;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;

SELECT device_name, location, maintenance_type FROM IoTDevices INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON IoTDevices.device_id = MaintenanceSchedule.device_id WHERE Installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM device;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM device ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM device WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_model, last_maintenance_date FROM device WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_status FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM device;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type FROM device d JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON d.device_id = ms.device_id WHERE ms.maintenance_type='regular';

SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_status FROM device d JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON d.device_id = ms.device_id JOIN maintenance_log ml ON ms.schedule_id = ml.schedule_id WHERE ml.maintenance_status='completed';

SELECT d.device_name, ms.maintenance_date, ml.maintenance_status FROM device d JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON d.device_id = ms.device_id JOIN maintenance_log ml ON ms.schedule_id = ml.schedule_id WHERE ml.notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM iot_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE schedule_id = 10 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE completion_date IS NULL ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM iot_devices JOIN maintenance_schedules ON iot_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedules.device_id ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'Electronics' ORDER BY technician_name;
SELECT * FROM device;
SELECT device_name, device_type, condition FROM device ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device WHERE condition='Good';
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technician;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM device ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM device WHERE device_type = 'Printer';
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM device WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, condition FROM device ORDER BY condition DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, ds.maintenance_date, tl.maintenance_notes FROM device d JOIN maintenance_schedule ds ON d.device_id = ds.device_id JOIN maintenance_log tl ON ds.schedule_id = tl.schedule_id;
SELECT d.device_name, t.technician_name FROM device d JOIN device_assignment da ON d.device_id = da.device_id JOIN technician t ON da.technician_id = t.technician_id;
